notes.title: Implement Login Page
notes.description: Create a login page with email and password fields.

notes.title: Refactor API Calls
notes.description: Update API calls to use Axios for better error handling.

notes.title: Write Unit Tests
notes.description: Add unit tests for components using Jest and React Testing Library.

notes.title: Fix Styling Issues
notes.description: Resolve CSS bugs causing layout issues on smaller screens.

notes.title: Optimize Performance
notes.description: Identify and fix performance bottlenecks in the application.

notes.title: Add Dark Mode
notes.description: Implement a dark mode feature using CSS variables.

notes.title: Update Documentation
notes.description: Improve the project documentation for better readability.

notes.title: Integrate Redux
notes.description: Integrate Redux for state management in the application.

notes.title: Deploy to Production
notes.description: Prepare and deploy the application to a production server.

notes.title: Fix Navigation Bug
notes.description: Investigate and fix navigation issue causing links to break.

notes.title: Implement Form Validation
notes.description: Add client-side form validation using Formik and Yup.

notes.title: Add Animation Effects
notes.description: Enhance user experience with animated transitions between pages.

notes.title: Update Dependency Versions
notes.description: Update project dependencies to the latest stable versions.

notes.title: Refactor Redux Store
notes.description: Simplify and optimize the structure of the Redux store.

notes.title: Implement Responsive Design
notes.description: Ensure the application is fully responsive across all devices.
